attributes.action: link the annual MPs pay rise to the average given to doctors, teachers, nurses and firebrigade
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To give the MPs the same annual pay increase (% terms) as the average awarded to a representative set of key public servants. Namely Teachers, NHS GPs, The Fire Brigade and the Police. This would then stop MP awarding themselves pay rises and ensure it is linked to the pay of normal working people.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
